attributes.action: Stop forcing deadly alcohol legalise healthy options
attributes.additional_details: Cannabis is a naturally growing plant with psychoactive and healing properties. It does not cause death and yet is an illegal substance. Why does the government encourage our nation to use a deadly substance and deny any healthy alternatives?..this is breach of human rights.
attributes.background: Alcohol is one of the most poisonous psychoactive substances causiing death a violent society breakdown of families. Its effects cost the nhs police and the nation ridiculous amounts of money.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. 

If you would like cannabis to be legalised, you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118978
